column3: Only critical bugs should be back ported IMO. We are already in rc2 stage.\n

Agree with @jonasschnelli. On the other hand the risk of this introducing a regression is low.

This is something that could be merged if we need to do a rc3 in the first place and won't label rc2 as final.
Otherwise it could be merged after final for 0.12.1.
Sure, this was my intend. Just wait to see what other backports are required (if any).\n
Agree with these (now that it's clear there will be a rc3)\n

- Cherry-picked https://github.com/MarcoFalke/bitcoin/commit/a83a371f443b850b3450190ec8b4056b05f830eb (#7384) as 294f4320a246e453a0509c82b4112b2a5203dd81\n- https://github.com/MarcoFalke/bitcoin/commit/6a048953b7808c0fc7653cb50ee5a9d861c24519 (#7391) is already part of 0.12 through #7440\n
